title: Who we are
text:
Who we are - IFAD



































Who we are









©IFAD/GMB Akash 









IFAD












 is the world’s fund for transforming agriculture, rural economies and food systems.






We invest 











in rural people, who are often the world’s poorest and most vulnerable.


























The road to a better future runs through rural areas










At the International Fund for Agricultural Development, we envision vibrant, inclusive and sustainable rural communities, where people live free from poverty and hunger. The best way to achieve this is by investing in small scale rural producers.
With these investments, rural people can take charge of their own future and produce enough nutritious food for their communities.
By leading their own development, the change is long-lasting.





 See more about the world we envisage



 


























Transforming rural communities for almost 50 years











IFAD was established in the 1970s in response to a global food crises. 
Since then we have supported millions of rural people pull themselves out of poverty and thrive.





 Learn more about our history



 


























Catalyzing funds for greater impact











We use the contribution from our Member States to generate and assemble additional finance for rural people. 



As part of this we adhere to the highest transparency and governance standards.








 How we finance our life-changing work



 


























Collaborating for lasting change











Only by working together can we ensure scalable impact and achieve the Sustainable Development Goals. That's why IFAD works with a flourishing ecosystem of partners - from foundations to farmers' organizations.





 Browse all our partners



 


























Advocating for rural people











Our experts work alongside governments to develop projects so rural people can thrive.
Our leadership team partners with stakeholders to scale up this change.
Our President ensures that the world knows the invaluable contribution rural people make to each of our lives. 











Keep exploring
















 Where we work Spanning five regions and 92 countries, IFAD works where poverty and hunger are deepest. 

  Explore more 
           
 

















 What we do Simply put, IFAD invests in rural people. We do this by financing programmes, measuring results, innovating and working with rural people themselves. 

  Explore more 
           
 
















 Action areas From building resilience to empowering rural people and protecting the environment, explore our main areas of work. 

  Explore more

metadata.description: IFAD is the world’s fund for transforming agriculture, rural economies and food systems.

summary:
The road to a better future runs through rural areas










At the International Fund for Agricultural Development, we envision vibrant, inclusive and sustainable rural communities, where people live free from poverty and hunger. Learn more about our history



 


























Catalyzing funds for greater impact











We use the contribution from our Member States to generate and assemble additional finance for rural people. Browse all our partners



 


























Advocating for rural people











Our experts work alongside governments to develop projects so rural people can thrive. Explore more 
           
 
















 Action areas From building resilience to empowering rural people and protecting the environment, explore our main areas of work. Explore more

Who we are - IFAD



































Who we are









©IFAD/GMB Akash 









IFAD












 is the world’s fund for transforming agriculture, rural economies and food systems. The road to a better future runs through rural areas










At the International Fund for Agricultural Development, we envision vibrant, inclusive and sustainable rural communities, where people live free from poverty and hunger. Learn more about our history



 


























Catalyzing funds for greater impact











We use the contribution from our Member States to generate and assemble additional finance for rural people. Browse all our partners



 


























Advocating for rural people











Our experts work alongside governments to develop projects so rural people can thrive. Explore more
